entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How are we doing in the repo? Survey inside! #22623
  • ControlTemplate not propagating the BindingContext correctly if set through Binding #22607
    Backlog
  • [Android] Border doesnt expand on Content size changed #22606
    .NET 8 SR6
  • ImageButton RippleEffect not working in some cases #22603
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [Android] Label.CharacterWrap wraps text too soon #22594
    Backlog
  • Buttons with corner radius still have rectangular input areas #22591
    Backlog
  • Maui App crashes whenever it is killed in background by Android and then restarted by OS. How to investigate or solve? #22590

Closed

  • Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: setSpan (12 ... 12) ends beyond length 10 #21944
  • How to know what version of Maui/.NET each pull request goes into #22619
  • [regression/8.0.0] [Android] Border inside frame cause dont render content #18526
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Testing] Could not find a driver for automationName 'XCUITest' and platformName 'iOS'. #20452
    Backlog
  • Could not find a driver for automationName 'UIAutomator2' and platformName 'Android' #20482
    Backlog
  • Problem clearing VisualStates of collection items in a CollectionView, when the collection employs a DataTemplate generated with a DataTemplateSelector #22541
  • GtkSerializer should use transcoding stream #22598
  • Optimize allocations via ArrayPool/MemoryPool in Crc64HashAlgorithm.cs and other places #22599
  • Use stackalloc for multiple instances of arrays of constant size #22600
  • Expose TimeZoneChangedEvent in Maui.Essentials #22601
  • Incorporate a throwhelper into Maui.Essentials #22602
  • Follow CA1825 Use Array<T>.Empty in all instances #22604
  • Employ .NET [Auto]Vectorization features #22605
  • Changing ControlTemplate on Frame dynamically from XAML with DataTrigger does not trigger change on screen #21947
  • Can't connect from MS Visual Studio to MAC #20931
  • (1)NU1301 Error in MAUI Project: Unable to Retrieve Repository Signature Information for NuGet Source (2)MAUI App Crashes on Windows After Visual Studio 17.10.0 Update: Error Code 0x80070005 #22593
  • Rotate screen on ios <= 15 #22608
  • Optimize allocations via ArrayPool/MemoryPool in Crc64HashAlgorithm.cs and other places #22596
  • GtkSerializer should use transcoding stream #22597

PullRequests

Created

  • Add additional GC.Collect for tests #22624
  • Add a bunch of button tests #22622
  • [testing] Try xunit 2.6.6 with 2.8.0 vs runner #22621
  • [CI] Bump xcode 15.3.0 #22611
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Add possibility to run UI tests per category #22609
    area-testing

Merged

  • [WinUI] Optimize `TransformationExtensions` #22481
    area-animation, community ✨, t/perf
  • Update appium/drivers versions #22552
    area-infrastructure
  • [ci] Disable OneLoc for now #22595

Updated

  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • IllegalArgumentException when changing number of tabbar pages - fix #22589
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area-controls-collectionview
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Reduce the number of calls to invalidate measure #21801
    area-layout, t/perf, .NET 8 SR6
  • [net9.0] Merge main net9.0 bring arcade #22447
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Allow custom background drawable with a custom handler #22573
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-entry, area-controls-datetimepicker, area-controls-editor
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area-xaml
  • Support changing Window coordinates while changing those coordinates #22583
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
